author: jmason
msg: upped fudge-factor to avoid an FP on T_MSGID_OUTLOOK_TIME

author: jmason
msg: removed MSGID_OE_SPAM_01BC, T_MSGID_OUTLOOK_TIME is more reliable, hits more, and will not time out after a few years ;)

author: jmason
msg: compression of low-frequency tokens; halves size of toks db

author: zelgadis
msg: Add "min-hits" option, to only list tokens who's total of spam and ham
hits is a certain level; this way you can ignore all the tokens which
were only found a small number of times.

author: jmason
msg: bayes testing results now using: hapaxes; lowercase Title Case words if they follow /\.\s+/ or at start of paragraph, otherwise case-sensitive; no lowercase duplicates of upper-case or mixed-case tokens; keep @ signs; add Subject as separate tokens; tokenize Reply-To, From, To, Cc etc.; ROBINSON_S_CONSTANT = 0.30; N_SIGNIFICANT_TOKENS = 150; ROBINSON_MIN_PROB_STRENGTH = 0.27.    Also now using a 3-db-file setup instead of 5, as suggested by Dan a while ago.
